{
    "source_filename": "AudioSpeechToText.yaml",
    "metadata": {},
    "content": "# This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
# To submit a bug report on the content, see
# https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: AudioSpeechToText
type: class
memory_category: Internal
summary: |
  Converts spoken audio into text.
description: |
  `Class.AudioSpeechToText` is used to convert speech audio into text. This
  class provides a single **Input** pin that can be connected to other pins via
  `Class.Wire|Wires`.

  Roblox uses the following formula to throttle requests for this API based on
  the number of players in your experience:
  `max requests per minute per experience = 1 + (5 * number_of_concurrent_users)`.
  You can purchase additional usage using
  [Extended Services](../../../cloud-services/extended-services.md).

  For more information, see
  [Speech-to-text](../../../audio/objects.md#speech-to-text).
code_samples:
  - audio-wiring---speech-to-text
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags: []
deprecation_message: ''
properties:
  - name: AudioSpeechToText.Enabled
    summary: |
      Whether the `Class.AudioSpeechToText` object is enabled for processing
      input audio into text.
    description: |
      Whether the `Class.AudioSpeechToText` object is enabled for processing
      input audio into text.
    code_samples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    thread_safety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      can_load: true
      can_save: true
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioSpeechToText.Text
    summary: |
      The text resulting from the conversion of speech audio.
    description: |
      The text resulting from the conversion of speech audio.
    code_samples: []
    type: string
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    thread_safety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      can_load: true
      can_save: true
    capabilities:
      - Audio
  - name: AudioSpeechToText.VoiceDetected
    summary: |
      Whether the `Class.AudioSpeechToText` object is detecting speech in the
      incoming audio signal.
    description: |
      Whether the `Class.AudioSpeechToText` object is detecting speech in the
      incoming audio signal. `Class.AudioSpeechToText` records the speech audio
      until it ceases or until a maximum amount of 10 seconds has been recorded.
      Then it converts the recorded audio into text.
    code_samples: []
    type: boolean
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecation_message: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    thread_safety: ReadSafe
    category: State
    serialization:
      can_load: false
      can_save: true
    capabilities:
      - Audio
methods:
  - name: AudioSpeechToText:GetConnectedWires
    summary: |
      Returns an array of `Class.Wire|Wires` that are connected to the specified
      pin.
    description: |
      Returns an array of `Class.Wire|Wires` that are connected to the specified
      pin. `Class.AudioSpeechToText` has one "Input" pin.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: pin
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          An input or output pin on this instance
    returns:
      - type: Instances
        summary: |
          An array of `Class.Wire|Wires`
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Audio
events:
  - name: AudioSpeechToText.WiringChanged
    summary: |
      Fires when another instance is connected to or disconnected from the
      `Class.AudioSpeechToText` via a `Class.Wire`.
    description: |
      Event that fires after a `Class.Wire` becomes connected or disconnected,
      and that `Class.Wire` is now or was previously connected to a pin on the
      `Class.AudioSpeechToText` and to some other wirable instance.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: connected
        type: boolean
        default:
        summary: |
          Whether the instance got connected or disconnected.
      - name: pin
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The pin on the `Class.AudioSpeechToText` that the `Class.Wire`
          targets.
      - name: wire
        type: Wire
        default:
        summary: |
          The `Class.Wire` between the `Class.AudioSpeechToText` and the other
          instance.
      - name: instance
        type: Instance
        default:
        summary: |
          The other instance that is or was connected through the `Class.Wire`.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    capabilities:
      - Audio
callbacks: []"
